Thus, an analogy with animals supports the thesis that abortion is wrong.
Replies to Objections
The four arguments in the previous section establish that abortion is, except
in rare cases, seriously immoral. Not surprisingly, there are objections to this
view.  There  are  replies  to  the  four  most  important  objections  to  the  FLO  
argument for the immorality of abortion.
The Potentiality Objection
